data.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
data.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
Event Sched…

relatedRecords.name: Seattle GNU/Linux (aka SeaGL)
relatedRecords.description: SeaGL is a grassroots technical conference dedicated to spreading awareness and knowledge about the GNU/Linux community and free/libre/open-source software/hardware.

relatedRecords.name: Girls In Tech Summit
relatedRecords.description: The Girls in Tech Summit is a celebration of TechGirlz’s 10th Anniversary with talks on technology given by girls, for girls.
